text: Mu by’ukuri, ubuzima bw’isi bugereranywa nk’amazi (imvura) twamanuye mu kirere, akameza ibimera byo ku isi biribwa n’abantu n’amatungo, kugeza ubwo isi itoshye ibereye amaso, maze abayituye bakibwira ko bayigenga, nuko ikagerwaho n’itegeko ryacu (ryo kurimbura ibiyiriho), haba mu ijoro cyangwa ku manywa, maze tukabigira nk’ibyarandaguwendetse nk’aho bitigeze bibaho. Uko ni ko dusobanura ibimenyetsoku bantu batekereza
